data.name: Black Squad - EA FREE TIMED WEAPON PACKAGE 4
data.detailed_description:
FREE TIMED WEAPON PACKAGE 4!

Free timed weapon for all Early Access players.
One DLC per account.

Please try various rifles and sniper guns

[PACKAGE LIST]
P90 // 15 days
ACR GL // 15 days
M4 CUSTOM GL // 15 days
HNK416 GL // 15 days
S15 GL // 15 days
SIZ556XI RUS GL // 15 days
HNK121 // 15 days
AXMC // 15 days

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Thai, Turkish, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: CORE2 DUO 2.2GHZ / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.66GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 8600 OR GT630 / RADEON HD 6750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
